channel.title: Sniper rifle psg-1
channel.description:
I have never done a sniper rifle so me and my friend worked on a sniper rifle together. (he did barrel and scope, i did butt and base) By the way i tryed to add in client to show oyu guys pictures but... it didnt turn out so well.
so basically here it is
pic tracer off google:
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/TM-PSG1-L.jpg[/img]
The model:
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/Sideview.png[/img]
remember this is my first sniper rifle so please dont flame. and post comment what you like or what you dont tell me what i cna do better.
thanks, Buddy

item.title: Sniper rifle psg-1
item.dc:creator: @Buddy_budster Buddy_budster
item.description:
@Buddy_budster wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:7, topic:293864”]well… its not all one level, which is good. note to others: see how he has diff. levels and thicknesses in the model? DO THAT it makes it look better, a flat, 3d-surface is boring. make multiple levels in it
e.g.
Bad:

| |
| |
|_______|

Good:

| |
|. .| <See how this has a shape to it?
|. .|
|____|[/quote]

thank you good to know my effoerts actually work now and then.

Read full topic

item.title: Sniper rifle psg-1
item.dc:creator: @Assassins_Creed_Fan Assassins Creed Fan
item.description:
@Assassins_Creed_Fan wrote:

remember this is my first sniper rifle so please dont flame. and post comment what you like or what you dont tell me what i cna do better.
Either if it is your first sniper rifle or not, that doesn't give a fuck. It's what you got in yourself to make the model good, not that you practice allot on one model to get it superb. And if you don't want constructive feedback why would you even post?

Read full topic
